question: US Open Final: Sinner vs. Fritz
description:
Jannik Sinner and Taylor Fritz are scheduled to play each other in the Final of the US Open Men’s Singles Tournament on September 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Sinner” if Jannik Sinner wins his match against Taylor Fritz in the Final of the US Open Men’s Singles Tournament.

This market will resolve to “Fritz” if Taylor Fritz wins his match against Jannik Sinner in the Final of the US Open Men’s Singles Tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond September 15, 2024, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US Open (ex: https://www.usopen.org/index.html) including live footage, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: NFL Wk 1: The Free Tyreek Special
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if in the NFL Week 1 matchup between the Miami Dolphins and the Jacksonville Jaguars scheduled for September 8 1:00 PM ET all of the following occurs;

- Tyreek Hill scores a touchdown (including passing)
- Tyreek Hill records 100 or more receiving yards
- The Miami Dolphins win the game

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the game is not completed by September 15, 2024 (11:59 PM ET) the market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be NFL.com.
